StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GenerateHighSchoolPlan]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@SchoolYear int AS
DECLARE @DBID int DECLARE @DBNAME sysname DECLARE @ErrMsg varchar(100)
SELECT @DBID = DB_ID(), @DBNAME = DB_NAME()
BEGIN TRANSACTION
INSERT INTO HIGH_SCHOOL_PLAN (PLAN_TYPE, SCHOOL_CODE, SCHOOL_YEAR, PLANNED_MONTH, USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE) SELECT HSP.PLAN_TYPE, HSP.SCHOOL_CODE, @SchoolYear AS SCHOOL_YEAR, DATEADD(YEAR, 1, HSP.PLANNED_MONTH), 'SA' AS USER_LOGIN, GETDATE() AS UPDATE_DATE FROM HIGH_SCHOOL_PLAN HSP WHERE HSP.SCHOOL_YEAR = (@SchoolYear - 1) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM HIGH_SCHOOL_PLAN HSP1 WHERE HSP1.SCHOOL_CODE = HSP.SCHOOL_CODE AND HSP1.PLAN_TYPE = HSP.PLAN_TYPE AND HSP1.SCHOOL_YEAR = @SchoolYear)
IF @@ERROR != 0 BEGIN --- IF THE INSERT FAILED, ROLLBACK THE TRANSACTION AND RAISE AN ERROR ROLLBACK TRANSACTION SET @ErrMsg = 'An error occurred genera.ng the HS Plans for School Year ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), @SchoolYear) + '.' RAISERROR (@ErrMsg, 16, 1, @DBID, @DBNAME) RETURN END ELSE BEGIN --- IF THE INSERT WAS SUCCESSFUL, COMMIT THE TRANSACTION COMMIT TRANSACTION END
